alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 5:53AM AKST until January 05 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility. Winds gusting to 30 mph. Wind chills to 40 below. * WHERE...Along the Elliot Highway * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Blowing snow will cause low visibility over elevated terrain. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur over elevated terrain. Wind will decrease through the day today, with blowing snow ending and visibility improving this afternoon.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
